name: Verify Screen Interaction
description: Validates that screen interactions work correctly including entering and exiting screen view mode.
testObjective: Ensure screen interaction system provides consistent behavior across all interactive screens.
author: Dominic Brooks

steps.action: Interact with any ship screen using E or LMB
steps.expected: Player enters screen view mode, interface displays correctly

steps.action: Attempt to move using WASD while in screen view
steps.expected: Player movement is disabled while in screen view
Screen view closes and player returns to normal view
Screen view opens again without issues

postconditions: Player can consistently enter and exit screen view
No controls are broken after exiting screen view
